title: Minga: we work together
creator_credit: Don Whyte and Reynolds Film Productions
brief_description: Presents aspects of the lives of South American Indians living in Northern Ecuador. Shows weaving (which is the main source of income), the sharing of resources within the community, the activities of the town’s market place and the types of housing and diet. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
